column3: erosion and deposition have created and modified the relief to its present form.

column1: Hindi Tansl: BUgarBIya nirmANoM ke awirikwa
column4: aparaxana waWA nikRepaNa ke xvArA varwamAna uccAvacoM kA nirmANa waWA saMSoXana huA hE.

column1: Anu Translation:  BUvijFAnI suvyavasWiwa krama ke alAvA pAra karanA katAva Ora nikRepaNa jEse ki bahuwa prakriyAez usakA varwamAna rUpa rAhawa banAyA Ora suXArA milawA hE
